title: Alarming for Juniper MIST SD LAN/WiFi (NC/eVA) Q1/23
description:
Description
Mapping of the alarms has to be done by NC/eVA
  Business Value: high (low/medium/high)
first actors/End Users: Operations 
  Pre-requisits: evertyhing clear
  Clarification needed:
Network ID 
Tenant Name ServiceNow, PMA-ISEM, eVA and NetCracker
Support from Process Team
 

Business Scope:
Handling networking events on global scale for our JUMAI solution is necessary. This covers “internal” (within the solution in order to monitor and administer the product) events.
acceptance_criteria: The PULL alarms are successfully generated in NC
The PULL alarms are successfully forwarded from NC to eVA
The PULL alarms are successfully processed by eVA
